Description.value: No armor, no problems!\nExcept, you know, bullets,\nand knives, and grenades.

The Talon Company offered to sell us
this armor at reduced price. We said yes.
Its a litte stronger than our current
Extended Protection due to
some 'space age' polymers.

The coup de grâce of personal body armor.
This armor provides a whopping 95 percent
chance to absorb fire. However, armor
will slow your operatives down considerably.
If your facing the wrong way,
kiss your life away.

So we heard the Shields complaining
in the Brake Room. And then to remedy
thier incessant whining, here's the fully
automatic, 33 round, Glock 18.

Oh, and you guys can use it too.

So we heard the Shields complaining
in the Brake Room. And then to remedy
thier incessant whining, here's the fully
automatic, 33 round, Glock 18.

Oh, and you guys can use it too.

So we heard the Shields complaining
in the Brake Room. And then to remedy
thier incessant whining, here's the fully
automatic, 33 round, Glock 18.

So we heard the Shields complaining
in the Brake Room. And then to remedy
thier incessant whining, here's the fully
automatic, 33 round, Glock 18.

The M240L is the new lightweight version
of the M240 which offers an 18 percent
reduction in weight. This model offers a
100-Round magazine with an open bolt.
However, this weapon slows movement and
turn speed greatly.

The M240L is the new lightweight version
of the M240 which offers an 18 percent
reduction in weight. This model offers a
100-Round magazine with an open bolt.
However, this weapon slows movement and
turn speed greatly.

A full auto, death dealing monster.
Even the military doesn't issue this bad boy
to thier troops because who really
needs 5 Rounds Per Second?

We do. Because we can.

A full auto, death dealing monster.
Even the military doesn't issue this bad boy
to thier troops because who really
needs 5 Rounds Per Second?

We do. Because we can.

This tiny weapon made popular by many
Hollywood films and used by opposing forces
is now available for you team. Due
to its small size it can be equipped
as a secondary.

Grants the ability breach locked doors.

This tiny weapon made popular by many
Hollywood films and used by opposing forces
is now available for you team. Due
to its small size it can be equipped
as a secondary.

Grants the ability breach locked doors.

The Talon M4 Shortie is used by Talon
operators in tight quarters. However, at
range it can still hold its own in
a firefight. Due to the smaller size, your
operatives will enjoy increased mobility.

The Talon M4 Shortie is used by Talon
operators in tight quarters. However, at
range it can still hold its own in
a firefight. Due to the smaller size, your
operatives will enjoy increased mobility.

This is the special SD version.

Sound Range: 10m

The Mac-11 is the more modern version of the
ever popular Mac-10 in use by our enemies.
This fast firing weapon has 32 round
magazine and is ready to shred any medium
to close range foes you encounter.

The Mac-11 is the more modern version of the
ever popular Mac-10 in use by our enemies.
This fast firing weapon has 32 round
magazine and is ready to shred any medium
to close range foes you encounter.

The German engineering take on the AR15,
the HK416 is a favourite of Tier 1 Special
Operation Groups and armchair commandos
worldwide. Very reliable and accurate, in the
10 inch barrel version it's also
maneuverable but a little slow on the target
due to the heavy rail. This particular
model sports an M26 Mass with
breaching rounds.

At first we were going to invest in the LAW,
but after Talon offered us some
'reapropriated' RPG-7s we couldn't pass
them up!

They have been loaded with anti-infantry
charges.
And, please, watch out for civilians.
A killing machine that you should be\ncareful of civilian if exists.\n

If you need to be absolutely quiet,
this is the way to. Using custom
heads that create a small explosion
inside the body, these are quite deadly when
contact with skin is made.

You want to go out with just a knife?
Fine, just get the job done

And please, don't tell the boss.

Params.operationInfoText: As Fast As You Can Swing

Description.value: This knife is longer...\nI still don't think this is a good idea.

Params.operationInfoText: As Fast As You Can Swing

Description.value: See, this actually makes sense guys.\nThis is something that has been done for\nthousands of years!

Params.operationInfoText: As Fast As You Can Swing

Description.value: I mean, if you're going to be running\naround with knives, you might as well\njust throw them.
Throw fifty of them!\nI don't even care any more!

The combat alloy shield is made of
super-modern materials allowing for
increased protection while retaining a
FOV of 80. This shield is very heavy and will
slow the movement and turn speed of your
operatives.
